name: Secret Sword
effect:
Apply the foe's Defense instead of its Sp. Defense to resist Damage from this Move. This move can't be redirected in any way. 
 At Silver Rank, increase this move's power to 5.
 At Gold Rank, ignore any Increases to the foe's Defense.
 At Platinum Rank, increase this move's power to 7.
 At Diamond Rank, this move gains High Critical.
description: An invisible wave cuts through the target, you can feel its sharp edge but you cannot see it.
